1.0.name: wordpress/dropbox-sync
1.0.description:
Dropbox Sync will allow you to sync all your images from your blog posts to Dropbox. All images will load from Dropbox decreasing bandwidth and increase loading times. It's a great way to backup all your files too!

You can signup for dropbox here https://www.getdropbox.com/referrals/NTI0OTQ4Nzk

You can also check it out in action on my blog here, http://adrianstech.com
